name: RiverBendercomFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Want to hear the latest news and sports headlines for the greater RiverBend area in Illinois, but don't have time to read. With the Daily RiverBender.com News Podcast, you can listen to the latest headlines and news stories read by David Ollenbittle. You can hear all the latest headlines and stories in Madison, Macoupin, Calhoun, Jersey, and Greene counties just by subscribing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
